question: [Calm] Dansk: Angiv which category has the highest bar fra sojlediagrammet.

qas.question: [Calm] Dansk: Angiv which category has the highest bar fra sojlediagrammet.
[Brief] English: Tell which category has the lowest bar from the bar chart.
[Brief] Italiano: Comunica what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars dal grafico a barre.
